name: casting hearts
description:
languages: english / 日本語

・・・

have a crystal ball date with your witch girlfriend.

・・・

casting hearts is a long-distance visual novel about magic, anxiety, and connection.

it's your girlfriend's birthday, but you can't meet up in person. try to make the best of things so that the night can still be a magical one.

・・・

features:

  • you, a witch with anxiety issues
  • your girlfriend (also a witch)
  • a date with your witch girlfriend
  • stress from living during a pandemic
  • two endings with date plan variants

・・・

content warning:
discusses a pandemic/lockdown in a fantasy setting.

・・・

made by npckc with music by sdhizumi.
